alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued August 09 at 12:45AM MST until August 09 at 1:30AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 130 AM MST. * At 1244 AM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from near Salt River Indian Community to 7 miles west of Sun Lakes to 8 miles southeast of Maricopa, moving northwest at 60 mph. HAZARD...Less than three miles visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 128 and 172. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 210. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 13. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Glendale, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Avondale, Goodyear, Paradise Valley, Tolleson, Laveen, Cashion, Sun Lakes and Maricopa. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
